Expedition Captain Jamoa:
Our mission is to prevent dinosaurs from leaving the Primeval Isle.
Recently we've have received an urgent message! Apparently, dragons have subjugated the dinosaurs of the Primeval Isle and are using them for conquest. We need a hero who can deal with this problem.
To travel to the Primeval Isle, go through the Eastern Entrance.
To travel to the Swamp of Screams, go through the Southern Entrance. It is only available to warriors of Lv. 110+.
To travel to the Blazing Swamp, go through the Western Entrance. It is only available to warriors of Lv. 115+
To travel to the Wasteland, go through the Northern Entrance. It is only available to warriors of Lv. 120+
